channel.title: Any Tips?
channel.description:
[center] I'm working on some Visual Changes to my Client such as sprites, Crowns, textures, Models and I can't figure this out.
I'll put a picture of my client below [With Edits] And the totally black areas are the places I need help with. [b]What should I put there[/b]? a texture of some kind or give me a picture
Also I tried removing the mapback both in sprites and cache and it worked but when my minimap changed(something moved or you move the camera) the dots will blurr. [b]How do i fix it?[/b]
current client
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/6enm6s.png[/img]
Edits are to keep the sprites a secret so none of my players will see it before i want them to

item.title: Any Tips?
item.dc:creator: @stewie0888 stewie0888
item.description:
@stewie0888 wrote:

[center]
I’m working on some Visual Changes to my Client such as sprites, Crowns, textures, Models and I can’t figure this out.

I’ll put a picture of my client below [With Edits] And the totally black areas are the places I need help with. What should I put there? a texture of some kind or give me a picture

Also I tried removing the mapback both in sprites and cache and it worked but when my minimap changed(something moved or you move the camera) the dots will blurr. How do i fix it?

current client

Edits are to keep the sprites a secret so none of my players will see it before i want them to
